attributes.action: Government to offer more assistance to car owners to meet the new emissions reqs
attributes.additional_details:
Without support from the Government the UK will be far behind other countries in terms of becoming 'Green' and the public are again left with the financial burden of the high costs of an electric car making the process counter-intuitive.

ULEZ coming to the North & South circular in 2021 millions of car owners will be unable to keep up paying the ULEZ fee or sell their existing car to buy a ULEZ compliant car. - Provide Support! 

YOU HELP US, WE HELP YOU #OneUK
attributes.background:
Offer assistance to car owners to meet the UK targets and new emissions requirements such as ULEZ!

Electric cars are very unaffordable for most car buyers and its still cheaper to buy a petrol/diesel car leaving most car buyers with no other option than to buy a non-green car

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you'd like the Government to support car owners, but we're not sure how. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
